name: Jestream Aviation Academy
about: JETSTREAM Aviation Academy is a well-established Approved Training Organisation (ATO) and certified Flight and Type Rating Training Organisation (FTO/TRTO) under EASA regulations. With 25 years of experience in aviation training, the academy operates two main training centers in Athens, Greece, and Dubai, UAE. It offers integrated training courses for pilots, including ATPL, Type Ratings for various aircraft such as A320, A330, B737, and more, as well as courses for helicopter pilots, aircraft maintenance engineers, and cabin crew. JETSTREAM regularly conducts training and selection for major airlines globally and is known for its high-quality instructors and well-equipped facilities, ensuring top-notch training to meet the demanding standards of the aviation industry. The academy's international profile and expertise support both individual pilots and client airlines, making it a trusted name in aviation training.
services:
["Ab-Initio
TRI/SFI Courses

TRE/SFE Courses
